attributes.actor: Elisa Lasowski'''Mirelle''' is a character in the Season 3

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no character named Mirelle. Shortly after receiving his [[knighthood]], Bronn visits Chataya's establishment and hires [[Marei]] and Alayaya to celebrate his promotion.

'''Mirelle''' is a character in the [[Season 3|third season]]. She is played by [[Elisa Lasowski]].
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 3]]===
Mirelle is a [[Prostitution|prostitute]] in one of [[Petyr Baelish|Petyr Baelish's]] brothels. She is about to sleep with [[Bronn]] when [[Podrick Payne]] interrupts.<ref>"[[Valar Dohaeris]]"</ref>
